sqlMap.select: select b.idx, b.writer, b.subject, b.content, b.hitcount, b.recommendcount, DATE_FORMAT(b.writedate, '%Y%m%d') writeDate, count(c.idx) as "comment", b.writerId, b.fileName, b.rnum from (select a.idx, a.writer, a.subject, a.content, a.hitcount, a.recommendcount, a.writedate, a.writerId, a.fileName, @RN:=@RN+1 as rnum from (select idx, writer, subject, content, hitcount, recommendcount, writedate, writerId, fileName from jmboard order by idx desc) a, (SELECT @RN:=0) as R ) b left outer join jmboard_comment c on b.idx = c.linkedarticlenum where (rnum between #startArticleNum# and #endArticleNum#) group by b.idx, b.writer, b.subject, b.content, b.hitcount, b.recommendcount, b.writedate, b.rnum, b.writerId, b.fileName order by b.idx desc
select count(idx) from jmboard where $type$ like '%$keyword$%'

select b.idx, b.writer, b.subject, b.content, b.hitcount, b.recommendcount, DATE_FORMAT(b.writedate, '%Y%m%d') writeDate, count(c.idx) as "comment", b.writerId, b.fileName, b.rnum from (select a.idx, a.writer, a.subject, a.content, a.hitcount, a.recommendcount, a.writedate, a.writerId, a.fileName, @RN:=@RN+1 as rnum from (select idx, writer, subject, content, hitcount, recommendcount, writedate, writerId, fileName from jmboard where $type$ like '%$keyword$%' order by idx desc) a, (SELECT @RN:=0) as R ) b left outer join jmboard_comment c on b.idx = c.linkedarticlenum where (rnum between #startArticleNum# and #endArticleNum#) group by b.idx, b.writer, b.subject, b.content, b.hitcount, b.recommendcount, b.writedate, b.rnum, b.writerId, b.fileName order by b.idx desc
select idx, writer, subject, content, hitcount, recommendcount, writedate, writerId, fileName from jmboard where idx = #idx#
select idx, writer, content, writeDate, linkedArticleNum, writerId from jmboard_comment where linkedArticleNum = #idx# order by idx desc
select idx, writer, content, writeDate, linkedArticleNum, writerId from jmboard_comment where idx = #idx#
sqlMap.insert: insert into jmboard(writer, subject, content, hitcount, recommendcount, writeDate, writerId, fileName) values(#writer#, #subject#, #content#, 0, 0, now(), #writerId#, #fileName#)
insert into jmboard_comment(writer, content, writeDate, linkedArticleNum, writerId) values(#writer#, #content#, now(), #linkedArticleNum#, #writerId#)
sqlMap.update: update jmboard set hitcount = #hitcount# where idx = #idx#
update jmboard set recommendcount = #recommendcount# where idx = #idx#
update jmboard set subject = #subject#, content = #content#, fileName = #fileName# where idx = #idx#
